living_situation: Lives alone in a cozy apartment
family_summary: Comes from a close-knit family with parents still residing in Nantucket; has one younger brother who she talks to regularly.
communication_style: Prefers clear, concise information and appreciates when doctors offer actionable steps; values empathy and patience.
primary_motivation: Wants to maintain a healthy lifestyle to support her new journey into motherhood and to be active and present for her child.
barriers: Struggles with stress management and occasionally feels overwhelmed balancing work and personal life; limited social interactions can make it difficult to build a support network.
support_system: Relies on her family for emotional support and has a close friend who lives nearby; also participates in online forums for expectant mothers.
